summary.snippet: "Boneless chicken with fried rice or french fries are my fav."
"Ordered shrimp with broccoli, it was so dry, they didn’t give any gravy."
"Crispy!!and I highly recommend the honey one!!"

most_relevant.description: Sesame chicken so good. Highly recommend. This place taste so great. If you live local you are lucky. Workers are nice and clean.
Disgusting. Ordered shrimp with broccoli, it was so dry, they didn’t give any gravy. Egg drop soup had smell in it. Their price is unbelievable for this type of nasty inedible food.

I JUST WITNESSED  a women cooking food without  a hair net or hat. She was scratching  her  head handling chicken. This was first and  my  last time coming back to this place. I told the man at the counter and had no  reguard and no apology.  Health code volations.. need to be reported 311 WAS  NOTIFIED
Terrible food, hygiene and customer service for the black community!

I have been going to this restaurant for 15 years or more I know the owners and staff very well I usually buy shrimp fried rice with one dollar extra shrimp and plenty of duck sauce lol or my go to dish would be shrimp egg foo young when I’m feeling super hungry ! I recently tried their fried scallops they we’re very delicious and perfect if you just want a snack. from my own experience and observation especially since they reopened after Covid they are clean and courteous establishment but most of all and very important they keep an A from the department of health and for that you deserve 5 stars keep up the good work !

Extremely poor customer service !! I don’t know who that lady is who works there but she’s the reason why I’ll never order from there again. I called in to place an order and the lady read my order back but I changed my order from pork fried rice to fried rice and she screamed at me saying that’s not what I said. I told her I wanted fried rice instead and she asked me what’s wrong with me and to make up my mind. Never in my life has anyone been rude to me for changing my order . She’s so lucky I calmed myself down because I would’ve drove there and gave her a piece of my mind!! Even when I’ve ordered in person in the past she’d walk away without saying one moment , or even a hi. Whenever I’d tell her “thank you” after getting my order she’d just walk away and not say a word back. Yesterday was my last straw with that place! You can’t talk to your customers whatever type of way! I deleted their number. I’m done with that place!

Wong Tong soup was terrible. You could tell it was old and not fresh. Steamed vegetables was good. But the brown sauce was less to be desirable and salty. I'm glad I asked them to put it on the side. So I could use it sparingly. Shrimp fried rice was small shrimps and not cleaned. It will not be a frequent place I visit.

You would think after all of what these Chinese restaurants have been through with the coronavirus they would be top-notch with their customer service. But they're not it's business as usual. The majority of them just do not appreciate their customers. And it shows with their abrupt rude rapport with their customers.

Yea , so true. You can't serve food with ANGER . It's universal law. it transfers to the belly of the person eating it. I pray they will over come this way , and improve on customer service.  Until then,  I'M OUT!!!
